title: Waverly Wind Farm
text:
The Waverly Wind Farm is a wind powered electricity generation project in <a href="Kansas">Kansas</a> owned and operated by <a href="EDP%20Renewables">EDP Renewables</a>. This site is located near <a href="Waverly%2C%20Kansas">Waverly</a>, in <a href="Coffey%20County%2C%20Kansas">Coffey County</a>. The wind farm consists of 95 wind turbines over 25 square miles, generating up to 199 MW.
It consists of 90 Siemens Gamesa 2.1MW and 5 Gamesa 2MW turbines.
